item.title: Can You Drink Alkaline Water Everyday?? 7 Pros
item.description:

Can you drink alkaline water every day? Alkaline water contains a pH that’s higher than 7 - regular tap water has aÂ  pH of between 6.5 to 8.5 on the pH scale - according to EPA . On the health benefit claims, alkaline water is considered that its high hydrogen content allows better hydration compared to pure water, particularly during a workout. So, in summary, YES and NO - there are both benefits and cons of alkaline water on daily intake - leading to clear skin and weight loss and reduce cancer. So, begin with a moderate intake of alkaline water. Likely effects of excessive consumption of alkaline water include skin irritations, nausea, and gastrointestinal problems.
